snippet.title: Barbarization Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Barbarization on Steam: a roguelite dungeon crawler with elements of bullet heaven and RPG. Face enemy hordes and challenging bosses to claim new territories and grow your civilization!

Wishlist to support: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2892020?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=videos

#indiegame #game #gamedev #steam
